TABLE.NAME: amos_translators
TABLE.COMMENT: Describes the relationship between a language pack and a user. This can be either maintainer (has rights to commits to the language pack) or explicit contributor (displayed at the credits page even without submitted contributions).

FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the translator's user account

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The language code that the translator is allowed to translate, or asterisk for all languages.
